name: Couscous With Red Peppers
recipeIngredient: 1 medium-size sweet red pepper, cored, seeded and chopped into small pieces
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil in a saucepan. Add the red pepper, onion, garlic, cumin, salt and pepper. Cook over medium heat until wilted, but do not brown.
Add the lemon juice and water and bring to a boil. Add the couscous and blend well. Cover tightly and remove from the heat. Let stand 5 minutes.
Add the remaining oil and parsley. Stir with a fork to blend and separate the grains. Serve immediately.
